# Noble Clarity Engine
Predictive Financial Intelligence for the next-gen founders.

## Core Pages
- [Home](https://clarity.noblesworld.com.ng/) - Financial data analytics platforms.
- [Features](https://clarity.noblesworld.com.ng/#/features) - Predictive analytics for small business.
- [Pricing](https://clarity.noblesworld.com.ng/#/pricing) - Best budgeting apps for small business.
- [API Docs](https://clarity.noblesworld.com.ng/#/api-docs) - Financial Intelligence API & SDK.

## Key Concepts
- **Scenario Planning**: Monte Carlo-style simulation for business decisions.
- **AI Coach**: Gemini 1.5 Flash powered financial strategic advisor.
- **Runway & Burn Rate**: Precise survival metrics for startups.
- **Marketing ROI**: Connecting ad spend directly to P&L results.
